column4: hey. I cant get ubuntu installation go past "configuring apt" - Setting up primary installation repository. Tried with and without network. Tried to redownload the iso, the computer have internetconnection. what can solve this?
I have checked that the computer gets ip etc.
any other tip on what I can do?
yes. thats where I checked that the computer got ip.
Generation complete. and then it stopes
use the console with the shell and run ps to see what it is doing
it is a lot of prosesses
you can always try killing it, or just try conrol-c on the main console
it doesnt do anything when I do ctrl-c
but I will try to kill it
it say no such prosess even though ps shows them when I try to kill the PID.
sorry. it errored when I killed them and could try it manualy and then go on :) thanx. that bought me out of the loop
